system.requirements: Elite Advance, survived a traumatic experience giving at least 5 Insanity/Corruption.
system.effect: Whenever the charater makes a Forbidden Lore test, they can choose to gain +10 to the test, but in so doing gain 1 Insanity or 1 Corruption (whichever is appropriate). Additionally, whenever attempting Willpower or Intelligence Tests, they may substitute either their Insanity Points or Corruption Points for those characteristics.
